title: NPE in mvn quarkus:build (BuildMojo.doExecute)
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus 3.21.3 fails during the build if some property is an empty string.

Generally, it seems Quarkus has issues handling empty strings as SmallRye config "considers that null". And it seems that there is an unchecked case when such null value is passed further.

```
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoExecutionException
```

### Expected behavior

Quarkus should be able to accept empty strings in config.

### Actual behavior

Converts empty strings to null, and fails futher on.




### How to Reproduce?
```xml
            <!-- Quarkus config for quarkus:dev runs. -->
            <plugin>
                <groupId>io.quarkus.platform</groupId><artifactId>quarkus-maven-plugin</artifactId><extensions>true</extensions>
                <configuration>
                    <systemProperties>
                        <quarkus.profile>crdb</quarkus.profile>
                        <nx.granitPass></nx.granitPass>
                    </systemProperties>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
```

Probably related:
```kotlin
@Startup @ApplicationScoped
class PrintConfigOnStart internal constructor(
    @ConfigProperty(name = "nx.granitPass") val granitHost: String?,
...
```
(without a default value)

And also in config, this `${nx.granitPass}` is used, although in a profile that's not activated.


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux nexxiot-ondrej 6.8.0-57-generic #59-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sat Mar 15 17:40:59 UTC 2025 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "21.0.6" 2025-01-21
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 21.0.6+7-Ubuntu-124.04.1)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 21.0.6+7-Ubuntu-124.04.1, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.21.3
